thread.title: Hedgehog is scrubbed with toothbrush as he enjoys bathtime
thread.title_full: Hedgehog is scrubbed with toothbrush as he enjoys bathtime | Daily Mail Online

author: Harriet Mallinson For Mailonline
title: Hedgehog is scrubbed with toothbrush as he enjoys bathtime
text:
This adorable hedgehog loves his bathtime.
Delightful footage shows the pampered prickly pet being washed with a toothbrush by his owners and swimming happily around in a sink.
Francisco José Buendía Saorin, 29, from Murcia, Spain, bought the animal for his hedgehog-obsessed girlfriend, Rocío, 22 on her birthday.
Delightful footage shows the pampered prickly pet being washed with a toothbrush by his owners and swimming happily around in a sink
Francisco José Buendía Saorin, 29, from Murcia, Spain, bought the animal for his hedgehog-obsessed girlfriend, Rocío, 22 on her birthday
They named the critter Gazpachito and have now owned him for eight months.
In the video they can be seen gently scrubbing Gazpachito's tummy with soap with a toothbrush and washing him in a sink before placing him on a soft towel to be dried.
Saorin, who studied law at university, said: 'Gazpachito is calmer than ever when you bathe him.
'All hedgehogs, when in contact with water tend to pee and take a dump and I think it happens when they feel comfortable.
'We have really bonded since we first met last June, I adore him.
'I pick Gazpachito up at every opportunity, he is really cute and he seems to like me and feel calm.
In the video they can be seen gently scrubbing his tummy with soap with a toothbrush and washing him in a sink
The animal is placed on a soft towel to be dried. The couple named the critter Gazpachito and have now owned him for eight months
Saorin's girlfriend was always sending him lots of pictures and clips of hedgehogs so he decided buying her one for her birthday would be the perfect gift
'He would climb up on my chest and hide inside my shirt. I think I like him even more than my girlfriend.'
Saorin's girlfriend was always sending him lots of pictures and clips of hedgehogs so he decided buying her one for her birthday would be the perfect gift.
He said: 'We always find it difficult when deciding what gift to buy each other but in this case she really made it easy for me.
'She literally said Gazpachito was the best present anyone had ever given to her.
'In the morning we sometimes find him sleeping inside a boot, under a t-shirt etc.
'As they are night creatures, so they spend most of the daytime sleeping, something that really fits us since we are night owls.'
